messages.start:
Hi {}, Welcome to AnimeHive 🤖

I help download and stream your favourite anime from telegram without ads. I also provide anime recommendations so you never run of anime to watch 🥳🥳🥳
messages.menu:
What do you wanna do today 🤗

/download ☁️
/recommend 🧐
/latest 😉
/info ℹ️
/donate ❤️
/help ❓
messages.recommend: Enter the anime you want recommendations for 😋
messages.empty_search: We couldn't find the anime you searched for, check the spelling and try again 😣
messages.empty_recommendation: We couldn't find any recommendation for the anime you searched for, please search for another one 😣
messages.unknown: I don't understand your message ⁉️, please check /help for AnimeHive instructions
messages.download: Enter the anime you want to download 😋
messages.download_pagination:
AnimeHive scraped {} episodes for the requested anime (this includes HD, 360p, 480p, 720p and 1080p versions) 😁

For limiting purposes we only allow displaying of 10 episodes per request 😊
messages.donate:
AnimeHive is an open-source project (https://github.com/lordghostx/animehive) and free to use meaning you don't ever pay to use the service. However, we accept donations to keep our servers and scrapers working. Feel free to donate to the service with cryptocurrency ❤️
